attributes.action: justify keeping the details of Dr Kellys post mortem secret for 70 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM must take all possible measures to allay the peoples understandable suspicion that it is complicit in the death of Dr. David Kelly

rejection.details: Your petition overlaps with the following: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/TruthaboutKelly/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
